name: Road Trip: Shifting Gears
description:
Similar to Gadget Racers, your goal is to complete multiple challenges to open to tracks and challenges in order to win the game.

Finish in the top 3 in each challenge and win money to upgrade your car. There are over 100 upgrades available such as new engines, tires, steering wheels, shifters... even new car bodies and paint.

The game consists of 150 challenges on 60 different tracks. These come in the form of standard racing, drag racing, stopping on time within an area, jumping onto "bullseyes", running circles around a cone, and more. You'll never be bored from doing the same thing on the same track.

Enjoy tracks that are paved, sand, and snow. Also, enjoy racing in the rain where traction is poor. With the right upgrades to your car, you can handle these dangers. Without them, you may not finish in the top 3.

In order to progress in the challenges, you need to finish in the top 3 in each race. If you finish first, you not only get more money, but you also get a prize. Prizes are free parts for your car. This can save you money and can allow you to get certain upgrades more quickly as not all upgrades are available from the start.

Besides the normal challenges, there are also sprint races and battle races to choose from. Play all these races in single player, or linked with up to 3 other players. Or, connect to the GameCube with Road Trip: Arcade to unlock more content.

The game tracks all your parts that you have acquired, completed races, race results, and more.

shot.caption: Make your choice from the main menu
Customize your car with any parts you have or buy
Buy different bodies for your car, including dump trucks and fire engines
Pick what Cup you want to do.  You will have to complete each Cup in order to move on to the next one
Pick a race inside each Cup.  You must also complete each race in order to move on to the next race
One of the races includes getting as many coins as possible
Another race includes running circles around a cone in the middle of a rain storm
In this challenge, you must use speed tiles to increase your speed in order to get into the bullseye area before the snow stops you
Completing a race gives you information on the upcoming race
